record.id: field.name="cilevel" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name="environment.icm.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: cilevel
record.file.name: environment
record.format.name: environment.icm.g

brief.brief: The maximum level of downstream CIs of an affected business service to retrieve when you click the Fill button to select an affected CI.

detail.detail: In an interaction/incident/problem/known error/change record, you select an affected business service, and then click the "Fill" button to select an affected CI. The "Fill" option will retrieve all downstream CIs of the business service you select. For example, a business service named Email could have 3 children, and each of its children can have 3 children. If this field is set to 1, the “Fill” option will only retrieve the 3 immediate children; if the field is set to 2, the "Fill" option will retrieve the 3 immediate children, plus the 9 grandchildren.
